name: Master Piano Pro
description:
Virtual playing piano and other instruments on iOS device like never before.
Comfortable complete Piano and other keyboard instruments to play. Learn, play and impress people around you.

Playing piano was always impressive and romantic stuff, but who have heavy piano or big keyboard for this
moments. Playing our Master piano simulator on smart device is hand you can play anywhere and anytime!

You can choose mayor keyboard playing instruments like piano, banjo, pop organ, harmonica, violoncello, accordion, bells, flute, clarinet, harp, bass guitar, chorus and synthesizer sounds.

Features:
• Piano + 9 Instruments + 5 new
• Multiple touch for all fingers
• Sustain option (loop sound)
• Scale for size of keyboard keys
• Real keyboard with 88 keys
